task: Develop a basic Gomoku game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Accept advice'.
name: Advisor's Insight

branding_data.short_description: Play Gomoku with unique twists from insightful advice to guide your strategy.
branding_data.detailed_description: Advisor's Insight is a unique take on the classic board game Gomoku. In this game, you must align five of your stones in a row to win. However, the game introduces an intriguing twist by incorporating the oblique strategy, 'Accept advice'. As you play, you'll receive random pieces of advice that offer strategic guidance and challenge your usual approach. These advisories serve to enhance creativity and may lead you to reconsider your orders of moves, inspired by thought-provoking insights. The game combines the traditional strategy of Gomoku with innovative prompts that can both assist and puzzle players, making each match a distinctive experience.
